text:
February 27th, 1951
Mr* Arthur G. Goons
President
Occidental College
Los Angeles 41, California
Dear Mr. Coons:
I as terribly sorry that your letter of January 26th
concerning the Aasoeiation of Aaerican Colleges was
inadvertently mislaid.
You nay rest assured that the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters would be deeply interested in
being of any help in connection with the formation of
a a advisory council to interpret the liberal arts
colleges and universities to the American public.
Sincerely yours.
Seymour d. Siegel
President
